messages.message: Got it working with debugpy here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/67139) -- we can tweak it if it looks good (e.g. update the `run-docker` target(s), configure debugpy to wait vs dynamic attach, etc)

can also inline the `debugpy.Dockerfile`s directly into `docker-bake.hcl`, and we can specify an image context rather than relying on service targets -- this just made it a bit easier to get across what's going on
